issue.message: If you find yourself using this API in production, you're doing something wrong!!
Formatting %d followed by words ("days"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
issue.errorLine1: <string name="autofillDevSettingsOverrideMaxInstalledDaysSetting" instruction="%1$d is number of days since an event happened">Show in-context if installed in previous %1$d days</string>

issue.message: Formatting %d followed by words ("days"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
issue.errorLine1: <string name="autofillDevSettingsOverrideMaxInstalledOptionNumberDays" instruction="%1$d is a number of days">%1$d days</string>

issue.message: Formatting %d followed by words ("logins"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
issue.errorLine1: <string name="autofillDevSettingsClearLoginsConfirmationMessage" instruction="%1$d is number of saved logins">Are you sure you want to delete %1$d logins?</string>
